title: Arctic Grove Limited Edition Dice Set
description:
Pearlescent white resin contrasts with the heartwood of black walnut.
Sirius Dice is pleased to introduce The Grove Series.  Hand crafted precious hardwood is set into tinted resin to create a dice set unlike any other.  
Each set is a work of art with unique wood grain and placement for each die.  Also each die has its own inking for numbers and shading for both wood and resin.  Finally, each die is hand polished multiple times to display the luster of the precious wood.  No two dice will ever match, creating a true one-of-a-kind product.
Every set of Grove dice comes with a premium dice vault of sustainably sourced hardwood from Mexico and supple imitation leather band.  

The Arctic Grove dice set was crafted from heartwood of the black walnut tree.  For millennia the walnut tree has been the symbol of fertile and bountiful lands, associated by the ancient Romans with both Jupiter and Juno..  Its wood was strong, yet easy to work, while the walnuts were used for everything from food to ink.  
When brought to the Americas, the black walnut spread far and wide.  It was so prized that early settlers had to guard against ‘walnut poachers.’
This richly hued wood is still used today worldwide in making quality furniture.  The Arctic Grove set is hand crafted from the most lustrous specimens of walnut to create dice that are works of art.
Each Arctic Grove dice set is held in a vault of black walnut sapwood.  This sustainably sourced wood is drawn from the exterior of the tree, and boasts a lighter color than the heartwood of the dice.
Only 675 Arctic Grove sets were produced, and each one of these Limited Edition sets includes a certificate of authenticity.  Reserve your copy today before they are gone forever.

Lustrous blue resin mixed with nanmu-style Phoebe zhennan wood
Sirius Dice is pleased to introduce The Grove Series.  Hand crafted precious hardwood is set into tinted resin to create a dice set unlike any other.  
Each set is a work of art with unique wood grain and placement for each die.  Also each die has its own inking for numbers and shading for both wood and resin.  Finally, each die is hand polished multiple times to display the luster of the precious wood.  No two dice will ever match, creating a true one-of-a-kind product.
Every set of Grove dice comes with a premium dice vault of sustainably sourced hardwood from Mexico and supple imitation leather band.  

The Sapphire Grove dice set was crafted from a precious wood formerly reserved only for emperors. In the Ming dynasty there was a style of wood known as nanmu.  Prized for its luster and resistance to decay, it was so valuable that only the royal families could afford their use. 
When the Forbidden City was built, whole logs of nanmu were used to create pillars of the imperial palace.  As this wood fossilizes, it becomes known as Black Wood, and even today the price can exceed thousands of dollars per cubic meter.

The Phoebe zhennan tree was one such source of nanmu, and this wood is set into every hand-crafted die.  The Sapphire Grove dice set introduces the world to a luxury formerly reserved for emperors and nobility

Each Sapphire Grove dice set is held in a vault of maple wood.  This sustainably sourced wood owes both its durability and smooth texture to its tight grain, which gives also gives it a naturally bright luster.

title: Crimson Grove Limited Edition Dice Set
description:
Vibrant red resin combines with recently rediscovered thuja sutchuenensis wood
Sirius Dice is pleased to introduce The Grove Series.  Hand crafted precious hardwood is set into tinted resin to create a dice set unlike any other.  
Each set is a work of art with unique wood grain and placement for each die.  Also each die has its own inking for numbers and shading for both wood and resin.  Finally, each die is hand polished multiple times to display the luster of the precious wood.  No two dice will ever match, creating a true one-of-a-kind product.
Every set of Grove dice comes with a premium dice vault of sustainably sourced hardwood from Mexico and supple imitation leather band.  

The Crimson Grove dice set was crafted from a precious hardwood thought lost to the world for a century.  In 1899, French botanist Paul Guillaume Farges cataloged a rare evergreen tree known as Sichuan thuja.  
Sightings of this rare species quickly grew fewer and it was thought to have gone extinct.   After a century of searching, was rediscovered on mountain slopes not far from Farges initial finds.
Native to central China, this decay resistant, sweetly fragrant wood is now carefully forested for sustainability.  The Crimson Grove set is hand crafted from this precious evergreen to create dice that are works of art.
Each Crimson Grove dice set is held in a vault of cherry wood.  This sustainably sourced wood is renowned for aging beautifully from a light pink coloration to a rich reddish hue with a lustrous patina.

Only 675 Crimson Grove sets were produced, and each one of these Limited Edition sets includes a certificate of authenticity.  Reserve your copy today before they are gone forever.

description:
Click here to buy directly from Progress Initiative!

The D&D Pride Dice Set is a vibrant and meaningful addition to any tabletop gaming collection. Featuring a clear design with rainbow-colored ink, each number is uniquely color-matched to represent the spectrum of Pride. Every die in the set includes an embedded mini Progress Pride Flag, a symbol of diversity, unity, and representation.
This set is a round-edged version of the limited-edition sharp-edged set released by Sirius Dice in June 2024, which was previously available exclusively at SiriusDice.com. Now, for the first time, this stunning set will be widely available in Friendly Local Game Stores.

KEY FEATURES

Officially licensed D&D dice

Dice designed by Daniel Quasar, creator of the Progress Pride Flag


Clear dice with rainbow-colored ink on each number


Each die includes a mini Progress Pride Flag as an inclusion


Round-edged design (a follow-up to the 2024 sharp-edged set)


 Supports a great cause: $5 per set will be donated to The Trevor Project, helping LGBTQ+ youth in crisis


WHY THIS DICE SET MATTERS


A Celebration of Pride & Inclusivity: This set brings visibility and representation to the gaming community.


More Accessible Than Ever: Unlike the previous sharp-edged set, this round-edged edition will be available in local game stores nationwide.


Supporting LGBTQ+ Youth: A portion of each sale goes directly to The Trevor Project, providing life-saving crisis intervention and mental health support for LGBTQ+ youth.
